name: Out of Cake
description:
Our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
It's about a robot that slowly starts going out of control, going in random directions, and sometimes even loses control, like a certain direction or move.

I don't think I can edit the "authors" tag, So i'll list them here:

Skirlez
Astronic
ErezPlayHere
NeoAqua
